# Introduction to MyAdvancedStatsPackage

Welcome to the introductory vignette for MyAdvancedStatsPackage! In this vignette, we'll provide an overview of the package and demonstrate some of its key features.

## Overview

MyAdvancedStatsPackage is an R package designed for advanced statistical analysis. It includes functions for calculating mean, median, and correlation, as well as sample datasets for demonstration purposes.

## Usage

### Mean Function

``` {r}
# Load the package
library(MyAdvancedStatsPackage)

# Calculate the mean of a numeric vector
mean_value <- mean_function(c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5))


```
